channel.title: Orange Pi 4B on Orange Pi
channel.description: Recent content in Orange Pi 4B on Orange Pi

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Getting Started # Here you will learn more about your Orange Pi 4B. What stuff you need to get started and how to set up the board. Requirements # 1. A Orange Pi 4B Board. # Orange Pi 4B # 2. A power supply # You need a power supply that provides at least 5 volts, 4.0 amps for Orange Pi 4B. The power adapter comes in two variants EU and US plug.
